Navigation
Name Rascal/Expressions/Values/Node/makeNode

Synopsis Creates a node given its function name and arguments.
Function node makeNode(str N, value V...)
Examples 
rascal>import Node;
ok
rascal>makeNode("f", [10, "abc"]);
node: f(10,"abc")
